name: Achievement Hunter: Thief
description:
Achievement Hunter: Thief

In this 2d action / shooter you will play for a thief who wants to stop aliens who are trying to steal his treasure.
You do not have allies, only you, your weapons and a huge number of enemies.
Fight for your wealth, upgrade your skills, upgrade weapons and destroy all your enemies.

Game features:
  • Minimum allowable price
  • Real weapons
  • Fearless protagonist
